price: (61) That[938] is because Allāh causes the night to enter the day and causes the day to enter the night and because Allāh is Hearing and Seeing.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُولِجُ ٱلَّيۡلَ فِي ٱلنَّهَارِ وَيُولِجُ ٱلنَّهَارَ فِي ٱلَّيۡلِ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَمِيعُۢ بَصِيرٞ
footnotes: [938]- i.e., Allāh's capability to give assistance or victory to the oppressed.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: dhālika bi-anna al-laha yūliju al-layla fī al-nahāri wayūliju al-nahāra fī al-layli wa-anna al-laha samīʿun baṣīrun
